statements: DELETE FROM user_behavior_analysis WHERE behavior_type = 'login' AND interaction_count >= 10;
DELETE FROM user_behavior_analysis WHERE user_id = 123 AND behavior_type = 'click'
DELETE FROM UserBehaviorPatterns WHERE username = 'JohnDoe' AND behavior_score > 0.8;
DELETE FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 1 AND content_category = 'News';
DELETE FROM content WHERE publish_date < '2022-01-01' AND views_count < 1000;
DELETE FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'comment' AND interaction_date < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
